content: **this pattern is available for free when signing up for the creative crochet corner email newsletter 1 ** this simple ball toy is the perfect introduction to amigurumi crochet projects this pattern from corrina ferguson is worked entirely in single_crochet stitches with simple increases and decreases used to shape the piece with only 50 yards of worsted weight yarn needed to make one it s a quick stitch too **materials** * worsted weight cotton yarn approximately 50 yards * size g/6 4 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge * stitch marker * tapestry needle * polyfill stuffing 1 https //go creativecrochetcorner com/a28051/
